sampradayaka wadu karmanthaya rakaganima sandaha wu yojanawan hayak peratukara ganimin moratuwe wadu karmikayan dawantha pagamanakata sahabhagi wemin wadu karmanthaya rakaganimata piyawara ganna lesa janadhipathithumagen illa sitiyaha.eeye (24) perawaruwe pandahasak ikmawu wadukarmikayan gen sadi, moratuwa molpe aanandaramaya asalin patan gath me pagamana moratuwa nagaraye wira puranappu kridapitiyen awasanwu athara ehidi raswimakda pawathwina.danata awalangukara athi li badu saha iru dawa prawahana balapathraya nawatha labaganima, paramparika wadu karmantha purawaraya lesa moratuwa gasat kirima, dawa bhanda ha iru dawa prawahanaya sandaha balapathra labaganimata wana sanrakshana departhamenthuwe karyalayak moratuwata labaganima, aayathanika dawa bhanda sandaha thiru badu wadikara deshiya wadu karmanthaya rakaganima, rajya dawa sansthawe dawa wikinime mila ganan pahatha helimata katayuthu kirima, wadiwu widulibila wenuwen wadu karmikayata sahanayak labaganima yana illim peratu karagena mema pagamana saha raswima sanwidhana kara thibuni.ihatha karanawan pilibandawa janadhipathithumage awadhanaya yomukara sampradayika moratu wadu karmikaya aarakshakara dena men mema pagamanata ha raswimata sahabhagi wuwo illa sitiyaha.

eeta anuwa 2015 sapthambar masa 21 wani dinathi anka 1933/13 darana athi wishesha gasat pathraye pala karana laduwa warin wara sanshodhanaya karana lada niwedanaya, 2017 agosthu masa 16 wani dina sita kriyathmaka wana paridi thawaduratath sanshodhanaya karanu labana bawa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage athsanin yuthuwa mema anka 2032/32 darana athiwishesha gasat pathraya 2017 agosthu 17 wani prakashayata path kara thibe.

ananyathawa sangawa thabana lesa aya illa athi bawin ayata aadhara kirimata kamathi ayata pamanak ‘nelumwila’ amatha age thorathuru laba gatha haki ya. (2429265 ankaya osse silumina karthru mandalaye semali mahathmiya amathanna)wallawaya paththe dushkara gamaka pasal daruwaku asalwasi gedaraka rupawahiniya narambaa ena athara aliyaku ge pahara dimata lakwa amaruwen jiwithaya bera gath bawa tika kalakata pera mama puwathpathaka dutuwemi.thama ketharam dilindu wuwa da kedinaka ho rupawahiniyak gedarata gena’with narambaime aasawen sitina bawa daruwa kiya thibini.mama in kampawata path wimi.
